---
title: "Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita"
---

This page explores how life expectancy and GDP per capita change over time in the Gapminder dataset.

```{python}
#| echo: true
#| warning: false
#| message: false

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

# Average trends over time (all countries)
g = df.groupby("year")[["life_expectancy", "gdp_per_capita"]].mean().reset_index()

plt.figure()
plt.plot(g["year"], g["life_expectancy"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy")
plt.title("Average Life Expectancy Over Time")
plt.show()

plt.figure()
plt.plot(g["year"], g["gdp_per_capita"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("GDP per Capita")
plt.title("Average GDP per Capita Over Time")
plt.show()
```

**Analysis:** Over time, average life expectancy increases and average GDP per capita also increases, suggesting that improvements in economic conditions are associated with longer lifespans.
